isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING PUMP: VICKERS (LUK) V10NF AND V20NF - ASSEMBLE - PUMP

svcproc.title: PUMP
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 8 for all Items in parentheses

step1.para: Press the shaft (Item 12) into the bearing (Item 13) while supporting the bearing inner race.
Install the small snap ring (Item 9) on the shaft.

note.para: Before assembling the shaft seal (Item 8), determine the correct position of the sealing lip ( Figure 10).

step1.para: With the garter spring toward the pumping cartridge, press the seal (Item 8) firmly in place and lubricate the lip with petroleum jelly or other grease compatible with the system fluid.
Slide the drive shaft (Item 12) into the body until the bearing (Item 13) is seated. Tap lightly on the end of the shaft if necessary.
Install new O-rings (Items 3 and 15) in the body (Item 7) and cover (Item 2).
Insert the ring locating pins (Item 6) in the body and assemble the cam ring (Item 16) so that the arrow on the perimeter points in the direction of rotation.
Install the rotor (Item 17) on the shaft and insert the vanes (Item 5) in the rotor slots. Be certain the radius edges on the vanes are toward the cam ring.
Place the pressure plate (Item 4) on the locating pins and flat against the cam ring (Item 16).
Place the spring (Item 18) over the pressure plate (Item 4) and then install the cover (Item 2) with the outlet port in the correct position. Check the assembly against Figure 11.

Tighten the cover bolts (Item 1) to 40 to 45 ft-lbs. (54 to 61 Nm) for V10NF models, or 80 to 85 ft-lbs. (108 to 115 Nm) for V20NF models. te the shaft (Item 12) by hand to be sure there is no internal binding. Install the shaft key (Item 10).
If a mounting bracket (Item 11) is used, assemble the pump to mounting bracket. If a gasket is used, be sure that it is flat to avoid misalignment of the shaft.
